alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ada and east central Canyon Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary near thunderstorms along a line extending from near Garden City to Boise to 6 miles southwest of Boise Stage Stop. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eagle around 510 PM MDT. Meridian, Kuna, Star and Initial Point around 520 PM MDT. Nampa, Swan Falls and Middleton around 530 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley
